div.p: Select SOP (Source Of Payment Typology) codes. A set of codes that describe the kind of insurance used for the encounter.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in SOP (Source of Payment Typology)
CodeDisplay
3OTHER GOVERNMENT (Federal/State/Local) (excluding Department of Corrections)
5PRIVATE HEALTH INSURANCE
8NO PAYMENT from an Organization/Agency/Program/Private Payer Listed

description.value: Select SOP (Source Of Payment Typology) codes. A set of codes that describe the kind of insurance used for the encounter.

display.value: NO PAYMENT from an Organization/Agency/Program/Private Payer Listed
